scripts.build: ags bundle app.ts glace-shell && sed -i '1i #!/usr/bin/env -S ags run' glace-shell && chmod +x glace-shell
scripts.dev:init: npm install && if [ -n "$AGS_LIB_PATH" ]; then ags types -d .; fi
scripts.link-ags: if [ -n "$AGS_LIB_PATH" ]; then rm -rf node_modules/ags && ln -sf "$AGS_LIB_PATH" node_modules/ags; else ags types --directory . --update; fi
